sentences.en: a rifle with a telescopic sight
sentences.cn: 装有望远瞄准器的步枪

sentences.en: He drew his rifle from its sacking cover.
sentences.cn: 他从麻布枪套里抽出步枪.

sentences.en: He fixed a bayonet to the end of his rifle.
sentences.cn: 他在步枪口上安好了刺刀。

sentences.en: He gave a grunt and loosed his grip on the rifle.
sentences.cn: 他闷哼了一声，松开了握着来复枪的手。

sentences.en: He was aiming the rifle at Wade.
Pulling his rifle to his shoulder he squinted along the barrel.
sentences.cn: 他把枪顶肩,眯起眼睛瞄准.

sentences.en: The guard was killed with a high - powered rifle.
sentences.cn: 那卫兵被杀伤力大的火枪击毙了.

sentences.en: The hunter's rifle cracked and the deer fell dead.
sentences.cn: 猎人枪一响,鹿应声倒地死去.

sentences.en: The soldiers keep a tight hold of the rifle.
There was a rattle of rifle-fire.
sentences.cn: 传来一阵步枪发出的嗒嗒声。

sentences.en: They armed him with a rifle.
They shot him at point blank range with an automatic rifle.
sentences.cn: 他们用一支自动步枪在近距离射程内射中了他。

sentences.en: This rifle only holds one cartridge.
sentences.cn: 这支来复枪只能装一发子弹.

sentences.en: Tom was leading, a rifle slung over his back.
sentences.cn: 汤姆走在前面，背上挂着一支步枪。

sentences.en: We immediately barraged the enemy stronghold with a torrent of rifle fire.
sentences.cn: 我们立刻用密集的步枪火力攻击敌人据点.

words.tran_cn: 抢劫；搜索；用步枪射击（rifle的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a long gun which you hold up to your shoulder to shoot

trans.tran_cn: 快速搜寻，匆忙翻找 ，偷窃，盗取
